tool_description: An API for climate change from around the world
name: World Climate Live
title: World Climate Live

api_list.name: Get Single Source Live News
api_list.description: Deploy single source news live about climate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-climate-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/telegraph"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-climate-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://world-climate-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-climate-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Live Climate News
